info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 13 at 2:45AM MDT until May 14 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
* WHAT...For the High Wind Warning Today, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory Wednesday, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected.
* WHERE...Southern Gila Region Highlands/Black Range.
* WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from noon today to 8 PM MDT this evening. For the Wind Advisory, from noon to 8 PM MDT Wednesday.
* IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction:
Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive.
Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

parameter.value: HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT WEDNESDAY
